page.title: 16Information in Dean
page.content: The main source of information is the "Honeycombe".This is primarily the magazine of the 6 Stodden Churches - Dean, Melchbourne, Pertenhall, Shelton, Swineshead and Yelden - but is used as a calender of events and supplier of news around the villages. The Vicar is the Editor whilst a team of voluntary helpers aid him in typing, duplicating, collating and distributing this monthly magazine. There are several Notice Boards in the villages which are usually well-covered with posters of forthcoming events. The Post Office and Spar Shop are also always willing to stick up similar posters. Most news and details of events travels very quickly by word of mouth!
